title: We are staying in a beach house on Dolphin Drive on Oak Island.  The house had a beautiful view of the mangroves between Davis Creek and the ICW.  For two days we have watched a bulldozer clear this wildlife refuge.  Why are the clearing this bridgeless island?  We saw deer running on the island as well.  Why are they destroying their habitat?
text: Hello. I'm sorry for the delayed response. We had a reporter do a story that answers your question. Here's a link to the story: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100630/ARTICLES/100639965
